name: Run People Over Simulator
description:
use the arrow keys or WASD to move

 left click for melee attack

space to shoot press

 shift to plant a turret (turret needs to be bought to spawn it) 

run over the red guys who are civilians to get points the blue guys are police they will slowly move towards you and shoot at you the yellow guys are criminals and will attack you and the police they will also chase civilians and kill them pretty much stealing your points you have 8 hearts once that's gone you will die hitting police will give two points hitting criminals give 1 point

Update: you can now go into the police station and fight waves of police for a prize
